posts.post_content:
Posted By: Geoff
Hi there I am new here but have been reading Posts here for a while now.I am looking for a few Fatima Cards from the 16 Card Set.Me and my Father collect these Cards along with other Cards.We are trying to collect the whole Set.We will only look at Graded Cards.Lower Grades are prefered but we will look at anything available so we can complete the Set.

Cards that are needed from the Fatima 1913 T200's are.

St Louis National's

St Louis American's

New York American's

Detriot American's

Cleveland American's

Boston National's

Any help would be great if you have these or know of someone who does have these Cards Graded.

Thanks
Geoff

geof631@yahoo.com
